home.intro: I made this site to make managing cubari.moe repos easier. This site is static and open source.

home.contact: You can also contact me on Discord (stirante).

home.haveRepo: Do you already have a repository?
home.saveForFuture: Do you want to save PAT and repository name for the future (browser Local Storage)?

home.tokenInvalidPrompt: The token you provided is invalid or has expired. Please provide a valid token. You can check them here.
